ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and both the Last and First belong to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And to Us belong the End and the Beginning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and to Us belong the Next Life and the present.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and to Us belong the hereafter and the worldly life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed the Hereafter and this world both belong to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And truly, unto Us (belong) the last (Hereafter) and the first (this world).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely Ours is the hereafter and the former.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and to Us belong the Last and the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! unto Us belong the latter portion and the former.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and to Us belongs the Hereafter as well as the present world --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verify Ours is both the Hereafter and the life present.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and to Us belong the world and the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And verily unto Us (belong) the End and the Beginning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And truly, unto Us (belong) the last (Hereafter) and the first (this world).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and to Us belong the Last and the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And to Us belong the Last and the First.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:13] And truly to Us belong the Hereafter and the first [life], that is to say, [that of] this world, and so whoever seeks either of the two from anyone other than Us has erred.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! unto Us belong the latter portion and the former) and to Us belong the reward of the life of the world and that of the Hereafter; it is also said that this means: to Us belong the life of the world in which We bestow knowledge and success and also the Hereafter in which We bestow reward and honour.
